ARTICLE.TITLE: Taliban, Afghan government to discuss prisoner release
ARTICLE.TEXT:
Afghanistan's National Security Council said on Wednesday that officials from the Afghan government will meet with Taliban members to discuss an initial release of prisoners.

"To carry out these further discussions, a Taliban team will meet with the government face-to-face in Afghanistan in the coming days", the NSC tweeted.

The announcement came after the two sides met via video conference. The Taliban said on Wednesday that the release of prisoners by the Afghan government would begin by...
